advancement.minerslung:root.desc: The air is not always breathable deep in the earth and in other dimensions
advancement.minerslung:air_bladder.desc: Use an Air Bladder to refill your air supply on the go
advancement.minerslung:soul.desc: Breathe the life force given off by Soul Fire to maintain your air (but not increase it!)
advancement.minerslung:soulfire_bottle.d: Restore your lungs with the souls trapped in a Bottle of Soulfire
advancement.minerslung:protection_from_y: Protect yourself from choking air with something like a Respirator
advancement.minerslung:protection_from_r: Breathe freely where there is no air at all
advancement.minerslung:lantern.desc: Use a Safety Lantern to check the air quality around you
advancement.minerslung:disco_lantern.des: Use a piece of Dye to manually change the color of a Safety Lamp (you can scrape the color off with an axe)
advancement.minerslung:signal_torch.desc: Right-click a torch to make it spew particles, perhaps to signal the exit of a cave
